alert.note: Alert for Delaware; Sullivan (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 07 at 5:38PM EST until February 08 at 3:00AM EST by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 AM EST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Freezing rain expected. Total ice accumulations of a light glaze. * WHERE...In New York, Delaware and Sullivan counties. In Pennsylvania, Northern Wayne county. * WHEN...Until 3 AM EST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Very slippery sidewalks, roads and bridges are possible. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...A brief period of freezing rain is expected this evening through just after midnight tonight. Icy conditions are possible on untreated surfaces and use extra caution on bridges and overpasses as they are usually the first to freeze over.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Prepare for possible power outages. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1. The Pennsylvania Department of Transportation and Pennsylvania Turnpike Commission remind motorist to adjust speeds based on driving conditions as winter weather impacts Pennsylvania roadways. Visit www.511pa.com for the latest travel, roadways, and traffic conditions.
